entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Port nim regex tests #61895
    .NET 7.0
  • Port rust regex tests #61894
    .NET 7.0
  • Port pcre2 regex tests #61893
    .NET 7.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support for MultiSet & MultiMap in System.Collections.Generic #61892
  • CipherSuitesPolicy constructor throws PlatformNotSupportedException on Linux with OpenSSL 1.1.1 #61891
    7.0.0
  • Debugger is not able to step into non-inlined hardware intrinsics #61890
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Method to translate `PosixSignal` values to native signal numbers #61889
  • CryptoStream.Read adds "null" add the EOF #61886
  • Update the runtime to have deterministic floating-point to integer conversions #61885

Closed

  • Malformed recursive generic types can cause CrossGen crash or hang #5907
    Future
  • Long startup time on certain cultures (ko, ja, zh) due to slow ICU collator initialization for culture-dependent case-insensitive operation #61887
  • Avx2.AlignRight does not generate VPPALIGNR intrinsic #61877

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete Regex timeout tests with RegexOptions.Debug #61888
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • fix for excessive gen0 in high memory load situation #61884
    area-GC-coreclr, .NET 7.0
  • Add zlib-ng library, optimized for ARM64 #61883
    area-System.IO.Compression, .NET 7.0

Updated

  • [wasm] Use workloads to run AOT tests #61863
    arch-wasm
  • Fix a few special cases of projects with command line arguments #61758
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Actually use TargetOS=AnyOS in the build-test-job (Try 2) #61801
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] [Issue: 61620] Optimizing ARM64 for *x = dblCns; #61847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Adding support for the X86Base.Pause intrinsic on Mono #61707
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Baseline System.Speech for trimming errors #61874
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Do not explicitly pass type to `VNForMapStore` #61882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Test chromebug #61856
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Force console #61854
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
